item.title: How can i fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

case 6099: //(6099 in this case for teleport crystal can be whatever) teleportToX = (3299); teleportToY = (3644); heightLevel = 0; [b]deleteItem(6099, getItemSlot(6099), 1);//Delete the crystal on use[/b] addItem(6100, 1);//Add the new crystal. sendMessage("Your Figment Crystal has lost a charge! 3 charges left."); break;

Thats not quite as hard as you may believe. Instead of deleting the item (I’ve made that part of the code section bold) you need to make it change into a, using glory as an example, 3 charge glory. Give the teleport ability using rub to all of these, and make it change from 4, 3, 2, 1 charges. For recharge, you would need a recharging object, and make it so you can use the glory, and click on the object. I’m not writing that here, as it would be too long. Hope I helped.

I used quote to show the bold.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i fix this?

item.description:
@vato wrote:

case 6099: //(6099 in this case for teleport crystal can be whatever) teleportToX = (3299); teleportToY = (3644); heightLevel = 0; deleteItem(6099, getItemSlot(6099), 1);//Delete the crystal on use addItem(6100, 1);//Add the new crystal. sendMessage("Your Figment Crystal has lost a charge! 3 charges left."); break;

how do i make it so it can go from 4 charges, to three, then 2,then 1, then break?
or possible recharge?
